Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the use of social media websites, email or text messages for the purpose of debt collection
Summary: Prohibits the use of social media websites, email or text messages for the purpose of debt collection.
LawCode: Amd ยง601, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the use of social media websites, email or text messages for the purposes of collecting debts
